body_html:
I think this would be a great feature. We only used it for upscaling, hence not considering this case - but would be nice to support scale factors < 1. I also agree with @fmassa that it should retain the property pixel_shuffle(pixel_shuffle(x, 2), 1. / 2) == x.

We should also add this into the lua-torch version too
body_text:
I think this would be a great feature. We only used it for upscaling, hence not considering this case - but would be nice to support scale factors < 1. I also agree with @fmassa that it should retain the property pixel_shuffle(pixel_shuffle(x, 2), 1. / 2) == x.
We should also add this into the lua-torch version too
body:
I think this would be a great feature. We only used it for upscaling, hence not considering this case - but would be nice to support scale factors < 1. I also agree with @fmassa that it should retain the property `pixel_shuffle(pixel_shuffle(x, 2), 1. / 2) == x`.

We should also add this into the lua-torch version too
